TunableTuple.name: WELCOME_WAGON_TUNING
TunableTuple.description: Tuning dedicated to started the welcome wagon.

TunableTuple.name: available_time_of_day
TunableTuple.description: The start and end times that determine the time that the welcome wagon can begin. This has nothing to do with the end time of the situation. The duration of the situation can last beyond the times tuned here.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: The end time that the welcome wagon can begin.

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: The start time that the welcome wagon can begin.

Tunable.name: minimum_time_to_start_situation
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time since the service started that the welcome wagon will begin.

TdescFragTag.name: welcome_wagon_start_tests
TdescFragTag.description: A test set that we will test against before starting the welcome wagon.
